channel.title: How do I change the ip which the server starts on?
channel.description:
Ok, when I start the server it says "starting server > 0.0.0.0->43594" or something to that effect. Well I want people to join my server. But since 0.0.0.0 is the deffult ip. I want it to come from my ip so I can let other people come on the server, if anyone knows how/ whats wrong then please post, or pm, or message me on aim.
aim: hustleyomom000
thxx

item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

pwn3d:

i wanna use hamachi, i have a network, Bugerho-scape pass is buger…tell me how to get it to work?

Give out your port & Hamachi IP, now people can connect…

item.title: How do I change the ip which the server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

You can’t change that. Your server IP all depends on if you port forward (or don’t have a router & don’t need to) & use No-ip or you use Hamachi.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the ip which the server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

yes…0.0.0.0:43594 is a default and 0.0.0.0 pretty much means it will work with any IP you aren’t supposed to change that

Read full topic
